summary: A game of chase and get chased ensues after a suspended cop is betrayed by two men who helped him and another officer rob cricket betting money.
cast: Ajith Kumar|Arjun Sarja|Trisha Krishnan|Premgi Amaren|Vaibhav Reddy|Anjali|Andrea Jeremiah|Raai Laxmi|Aravind Akash|Ashwin Kakumanu|Mahat Raghavendra|V. Jayaprakash|Subbu Panchu|Boys Rajan|Ramya Subramanian|Tulasi|Vijay Vasanth|Kainaat Arora
keywords: cricket the sport|false identity|police officer|betting|money laundering
title: Mankatha
